cpc_ssh_demo: Here you can add SSH keys so that you can access your servers.
cpc_ssh_error: Oops! Unable to retrieve the list of your SSH keys.
cpc_ssh_key_explain_1: OVH uses SSH to secure encrypted data communications between servers.
cpc_ssh_key_explain_2: There are SSH clients for each operating system. Please see the guide on creating SSH keys for more information.
cpc_ssh_key_explain_3: Please note that you can also configure additional SSH keys on your instance in order to provide access to others replacing your lost SSH key pair.
cpc_ssh_add_submit_error: Oops! Unable to add this key.
cpc_ssh_add_submit_name_error: This name is already used for another SSH key.
cpc_ssh_delete_success: This key is no longer available.
cpc_ssh_delete_error: Oops. Unable to delete this key!
cpc_ssh_empty: You have not yet added an SSH key.
cpc_ssh_empty_add: Click on "Add a key" to fix it!
cpc_ssh_error_max_char: The name must not exceed 25 characters.
cpc_ssh_error_required_name: You need to name your key.
cpc_ssh_error_required_key: You forgot to enter your 4096 byte key.
cpc_ssh_error_pattern_name: Your key name may only contain figures, lower-case and/or upper-case letters, and hyphens ( - ), underscores ( _ ) and spaces.
